title: ARAM emote glitch
body: Sometimes when I join a game of ARAM, my emotes are gone for the entire game and I can't use them. But after the game it says that all my emotes are equipped. This has been happening for months now.

replies.body: Thanks for the report!  We're aware of the issue and we're investigating the root cause of why this is happening.  We're committed to fixing it - it's just been difficult to isolate the exact cause.  Thanks for your patience!

Please Fix Riot!!!

This is very annoying! I've even seen it in a few SR games too.
